TITLE: Installing Rust Tools for Solana SDK Development
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install rustc, cargo, and rustfmt for Solana SDK development. These tools are essential for building and formatting Rust code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh
source $HOME/.cargo/env
rustup component add rustfmt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Downloading Solana SDK Source Code
DESCRIPTION: Git commands to clone the Solana SDK repository and navigate to the project directory. This is the first step in working with the SDK source code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk.git
cd solana-sdk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Verifying Rust Toolchain Version for Solana SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to check the current Rust toolchain version. This ensures compatibility with the Solana SDK's requirements as specified in the rust-toolchain.toml file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
rustup show
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Solana SDK Test Suite
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the test suite for the Solana SDK. This is crucial for verifying the functionality and integrity of the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
cargo test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Solana SDK Test Scripts
DESCRIPTION: Commands to run various test scripts for the Solana SDK, including stable tests, formatting checks, clippy lints, benchmarks, and code coverage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
./scripts/test-stable.sh
./scripts/check-fmt.sh
./scripts/check-clippy.sh
./scripts/test-bench.sh
./scripts/test-coverage.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Formatting Solana SDK Code with Rustfmt
DESCRIPTION: Command to format the Solana SDK code using rustfmt. This ensures consistent code style across the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
./cargo nightly fmt --all
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Nightly Rust Tools for Solana SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to use the helper script for running nightly Rust tools, which are required for certain tests like rustfmt and clippy.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
./cargo nightly tree
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing LLVM Tools for Solana SDK Code Coverage
DESCRIPTION: Command to add the llvm-tools-preview component to the nightly Rust toolchain, which is required for generating code coverage statistics.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
rustup component add llvm-tools-preview --toolchain=<NIGHTLY_TOOLCHAIN>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Patching Local Solana SDK Repository for Agave
DESCRIPTION: Script execution to patch all crates in the Solana SDK repository for use with Agave. This is necessary when making changes that affect both the SDK and Agave.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anza-xyz/solana-sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: console
CODE:
```
./scripts/patch-crates-no-header.sh <AGAVE_PATH> <SOLANA_SDK_PATH>
```
